name: Pre-sql
value:
select case when CNT = 0 then CNT/0 else CNT end VALIDATION_CHECK
from
(
SELECT MIN(CNT) CNT FROM
(
SELECT NVL(CNT,0) as CNT, TABLE_NAME FROM
(select COUNT(1) as CNT,'rsgdst_sdr_coberturascontrato' as Table_Name from cdp_ods.rsgdst_sdr_coberturascontrato UNION
